summary: An ordinance providing for the transfer of money from the Sewer Extension Fund to the fund established from the sale of bonds voted at an election held September 5, 1911, under authority of Ordinance No. 27499, as a temporary loan, for the purpose of acquiring lands in the Cedar River Watershed for the protection of the Cedar River Water Supply System of the City of Seattle, providing for the repayment of said loan, and declaring an emergency.
